overview:
The leading distributors of electronic cigarettes in USA & Western Europe, under Premium Electronic Cigarette™ brand.

Premium Electronic Cigarette™ has a limited 1 year Replacement Warranty, 30 day Money back & free shipping available.

has quickly expanded to grab a healthy market share in the electronic cigarette industry worldwide. With a growing number of national and international distributors Premium Ecigarette is heading to the retail, tobacco, and convenient stores in every city in US and Europe.

Premium Ecigarette is the only company worldwide that provides a unique line of custom design batteries, and provides the largest selection of color for electronic cigarettes and accessories in the industry.

PremiumEstore LLC 552 Central Dr. #101 Virginia Beach, VA 23454

Days: Monday thru Friday Hours: 9:00am - 5:00pm EST Phone: 1-866-242-9210 Fax: 1-866-470-2175
